constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

description: Details required for conditions 12 (arboricultural method statement and tree protection plan), 13 (detailed drainage design), and 16 (construction management plan or construction method statement) of planning permission 23/02071/FUL (Demolition of existing outbuildings and erection of three storey side extension including dormer roof extension with installation of 2no. front rooflights, and single storey rear extension. Subdivision of plot to create three bedroomed dwelling and alterations to front elevation of existing dwelling number 18, including new vehicle crossover)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information was submitted to demonstrate that the proposal would not increase risk of flooding to and from the site, contrary to  policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient information has been provided in relation to construction Management Plan to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, contrary to policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012
